How process modelling & data science will enhance your food processing business

How process modelling & data science will enhance your food processing business

Written by eluciDATA (copy email
Copied to clipboard!
)
On 03 Jun 2020

On 11/06, the EluciDATA Lab will be giving a presentation on how process modelling and data science can support companies active in the food processing business to enhance their business. In particular, it will be shown how modelling goes beyond the process and can include applications for understanding and optimizing the food process and the food supply chain and for performing a life cycle analysis.  With this presentation, companies will get insights into how to start a data science project and get inspired via real-world cases from the food processing sector. 


This webinar is organised together with Technord & Agoria. 


More information: here.
